tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Our journey through pregnancy with Dr. Shefali Tyagi in Bangalore was nothing short of extraordinary. From the moment we stepped into the hospital, we were embraced with unparalleled warmth and professionalism.

Dr. Shefali provided exceptional care and guidance at every stage. Her expertise and dedication ensured a smooth and healthy pregnancy, encouraging us towards a natural delivery. Thanks to her. 

In conclusion, Dr. Shefali and her team surpassed our expectations. We're deeply grateful for their outstanding care and highly recommend them to anyone seeking top-notch pregnancy and pediatric care in Bangalore.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It is well know that Dr Shefali is one of the most qualified doctor in Bangalore but a couple of days back, when my wife was delivering the baby, we also realised that she is extremely selfless too. Like any other parent, we were also extremely scared and were about to make some bad decisions during the delivery. Those decisions would have made Dr Shefali's work much easier and saved her a lot of time but despite that, she spent at least half an hour(multiple times) from her busy schedule to convince us not to make rash and short-term decisions but think about the baby and her long-term health. She even read out medical articles for us and we are so glad we listened to Dr Shefali. I can easily tell no other doctor would have done the same. To all the to-be-parents who are visiting Dr Shefali, I can tell you that she won't do anything that will not be the best for the baby even if it means she will have to put in extra efforts.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Absolutely wonderful experience under Dr. Shefali Tyagi and her team.

I continued my entire pregnancy journey under a different doctor as it was closer to my home, despite having no comfort with the doctor. I assumed that the doctor being knowledgeable was sufficient and that patients can’t expect to be treated with respect or empathy. I had friends who had delivered under her care but since Sarjapur is far from my location, I didn’t want to travel in such horrible roads, without knowing if the experience would be worth it.

Somehow, out of anxiety regarding an uncomfortable birth experience, at 37th week, I decided to give Dr. Shefali Tyagi a try. It was an instant click. Her proficiency, knowledge and empathy was unparalleled. The fact that I thought doctors will always be unempathetic and irritated if they are busy, was thrown out of the window instantly. She was respectful of the birth plan I wished for. She explained me the pros and cons of my choice and what other alternative I had, which she could help me with. But once I made up my mind, she helped me in each step through it.

I delivered under her on February first week and my baby is one week old now. My delivery experience and subsequent visits to her have been wonderful. Within a week, I feel almost fine. The doctor I had been in touch with for 9 months never gave me an email id to contact during emergencies. Even during visits, anything we asked was met with irritated replies. She suggested going to the hospital emergency for any doubt and that’s what we did every time, for 9 months.

With Dr. Shefali Tyagi, from day 1 she had shared her email ID and has always responded to emergency/nonemergency doubt within less than an hour, even though I had just started to visit her. I wish I had this kind of support throughout my pregnancy.

During the time I was at the hospital, she even treated my mother for a long-standing issue and my mother was happy with the experience too. Since I had willingly opted for a C-section, she also removed an ovarian cyst for me, which had been there for 15 years almost. 

Would absolutely recommend the doctor. Finally, I had an amazing birth experience, which I had absolutely lost hope for. I don’t have a single thing to complain about.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
*** ******* ***** *** ** *** **** ****** * **** **** **** ********Quote says “Doctors Bhagwan ka roop hote hai” and She is absolutely Proving it..
She is living Goddess on earth..

Here, My story goes..

It was first time Corona crisis in 2020.. I and my husband (my husband was in BLR because of his office location and I came there to visit him) were stuck in Bangalore during My 5 months of Pregnancy though my treatment was going-on in my Hometown..

At that time I was recommended to “some other Doctor” in Koramangala for my regular check ups , She was continuously doing Ultrasound to check foetus condition and informed Us that My baby has 2 round of umbilical cord in it’s neck..also have given wrong information that my baby’s growth is not appropriate..It was Corona days so we were not ready to switch to any other Doctor because of Corona precautions/ risky factor for pregnant women and we have Trusted Her without doubting.. We have also requested her for normal delivery and told about our situation..so on early days she was assuring for normal delivery but on the day my water broke, she was all the Sudden like “we can’t go for Normal delivery, we need to take her to 
c-section because of the 2 rounds of the umbilical cord..We were verge of nowhere..
( Marvel Multi-speciality Hospital / Dr. Mamatha Reddy) 

So the Day My water broke by 4 o’clock in the evening we reached to Cloudnine Bellanduru and we have asked for Doctor Shefali Tyagi.. I was under her treatment in 2018 for some minor gynaecological problem, when my profile was sent to her, she recognised me..But at that time she was not in duty so we have requested to admit me and I was immediately admitted there by the duty Doctor, then we have narrated all our situation and told we are especially looking for Normal delivery..Because of Lockdown and Corona None would be there with us only I and My husband had to take care of the baby..
Then after Covid test I was shifted to labour room..
By the evening Dr.Shefali came and examined me and checked my reports and all..and I was kept in Labour for whole night and by the mid night I was given some medicine then next day by Morning Doctor again visited me..Then by afternoon at 1:29 PM my baby was born through “normal vaginal delivery (NVD)” under Dr. Shefali Tyagi despite of having 2 rounds of Umbilical cord in Baby’s neck..and my baby was born healthy with appropriate growth..
I am very much grateful to Dr. Shefali Tyagi and her team for understanding our concern and supporting us at the time of crisis by nailing the normal delivery with Her excellent skills..
Thank you!!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I got my forceps normal delivery done from Dr Shefali Tyagi. She left cotton gauge inside me and I figured it out myself after 6 days of discharge. In between those 6 days I emailed her that I am having a lot of pain and can't get out of bed, shall I visit hospital. She said it will pain and prescribed painkillers on email only. I used to take 6 painkillers in a day and still pain would not subside ***** ** ******** ** ********* ******* ** ******* ****** ***** *** ** ***** On top of that, the stitches she gave opened in just three days and she restitched after a week under local anaesthesia which was very very painful. Please don't go to her ** *** *** ******* *** **** **** **** ********** I was bed ridden for a month and could not feed my kid. **** ** *** *** ********** *** ****** ****** *** ****** ***** *** ******* *** **** **** ** *** *** ************** ** ****** *** ****** **** ***** ** ***** ****** *********** ********* **** ***** *** **** ********* * ******** * *** ******* ** *** *** ***** **** ****** **** ** *******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy care and management,
review: ****** ******* ** *** ***** We went to her based on feedback and reviews seen on Prato, *** * **** *** *** ** *** **** ****** * it was her who gave me the confidence to have a wonderful pregnancy, she had checked me from day one, she prescribed dos and donts, most importantly she had promised me from day one that she will be there at the time of delivery which most doctors don’t , even though there was this situation of lock down, and my water broke and baby was in distress she was present for emergency c section (where in she travelled to hospital from her residence  with in 5 min) , and my delivery was done so smoothly she was talking to me during the c section telling me to not to worry and in no time I heard baby’s cries and I was so so happy. Her intuition on baby’s health is excellent, she can simply say if baby is fine or not just by external examination. She doesn’t believe in old wives tales, she is strictly professional and has medically proven answers to any doubts,She visited me after the delivery and kept checking The Stich also she herself and removed the water proof Stich . She even responded me many a times over email on my queries. I cannot express how much me and my family members are thankful to her. *** ** *** **** ****** ***** I thank u so much ☺️.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I consulted Dr. Shefali Tyagi after reading so many reviews online. She is unfriendly *** ******* **** ****** ** ****** *** **** ****** ** *** ******** After 6 weeks scan, the baby’s heart beat could not be detected. She asked me to immediately abort it by taking a medicine. This was my first pregnancy and both me and my husband were shocked to hear about the miscarriage. She did not care to even respond to our questions and anxieties around the miscarriage procedure. She is very unprofessional *** ****** ** ********

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: ** ******* ** ********** ** *** *** *** I visited her since I was having delay in conceiving. She heard all my past details and started with minimum medicines and procedures. Even though I had to go for IUI… she made sure it is a success by understanding how my body reacts to different medications. After I conceived.. she took all necessary steps to make sure things go fine in first trimester. I had shared my worries with her and she made sure that all precautions are taken. The most important part is that she will respond to mails even for your smallest query so I always felt she is there with me throughout my pregnancy. She took care of all my pregnancy complications and made sure nothing goes wrong. Finally I had my baby in April 2022.. safe and healthy. I feel blessed that she was the one to bring my baby into this world. I can trust her blindly. Me and family will always remain grateful to her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We had a very good experience at cloud Nine Balandur hospital during pregnancy and delivery period. Special mention about Dr. Shefali. Suggestions, treatments, and care by Dr. Shefali was truly remarkable. Her expertise reflected in every treatment she gave. She was very friendly and considerate during all the time and took very good care of us till the last moment. She was available throughout the time for all questions and detailed answers and actions. Highly recommend her to the expectants mothers.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I started consulting Shefali Tyagi Ma'am at cloud nine Bellandur as soon as I got to know about my pregnancy. My first and second trimester very smooth. I was regular with my diet , my walk and exercise as well as easily managing my office. But as soon as I entered my third trimester multiple problems started. First in GTT I got to know I'm in higher side of gestational diabetes then got diagnosed with obstetrics cholestasis and then got to know that umbilical cord is around my baby's neck because of that she was not moving much. Everyone told me that I will be having ceaseron delivery there is no chance of normal but in this whole world Shefali Ma'am came as only hope for me. She told me if you are mentally prepared for normal delivery then we can do normal delivery. And as she promised I delivered a healthy baby girl on 16th April via normal delivery. And I followed her instructions very strictly after my delivery and now we both mom and baby are doing good.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I would highly recommend Dr.Shefali for pregnancy. This was my second pregnancy and it went very smooth under her guidance. She always asked what issues I am facing during pregnancy and gave solutions accordingly. She was also responsive on emails, which was very helpful.

VBAC is an alien terminology in India. No one believes that after a C-sec it’s possible to have a normal delivery. But Dr.Shefali is one doctor who is true to her profession, and goes with the facts. My first delivery was a C-sec, but not once did she say that the second also would be a C-sec. She always said that if my body prepares for a normal delivery, we can definitely go with it. She understood the reason why my first delivery had to be a C-sec and took care of that factor with the help of scans and medicines and helped me with a normal delivery, for which I cannot thank her enough!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ******* ***** ******** ** ** *** ** *** **** ******* ** **** **** ****** ** *** *********We can unbiasedly say that she is the epitome of positivity and gentleness. She dealt our 2nd pregnancy with utmost care, hope and smile. Each time we visited her with any complications, her words still reverberate in our ears" all is fine, nothing to worry. " We completed our magical journey under her fine guidance, support and care by giving birth to our second precious child. Dream comes true and we would love to thank you dear Doctor Shefali Tyagi and Cloud Nine Bellandur for the magical spell of experiencing motherhood second time. Thank you Doctor, you may continue fulfilling dreams for many more Saranya's.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Visited the doctor for my pregnancy.want to start by saying that I am glad I decided to be under her guidance and supervision in this journey. I was diagnosed with short cervix in pregnancy and with her treatment and guidance I was able to carry the pregnancy successfully. She has a very positive approach to each situation and this attitude of her's gives so much confidence in tough situationsshe is immensely professional and prompt, everytime there was an urgency of treatment she was always quick in her decision. I am so thankful to her

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: The kind of knowledge and the soft speaking skill really commendable. I had very difficult test for which she was pacifying me while testing. This is very rare. She has a good motherly heart. All your woories will go away with her smile and talk.cinsult her blindly . She will never send you empty hand.Always prefer the natural way of treatment. Ask for less test and  less medicine.Even though i have not conceived yet but still her way of treatment is really good.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Had a superb experience with Dr Shefali throughout my pregnancy from first month to even post pregnancy support. She was extremely calm through all the ups and downs of pregnancy and gave the right input for us at all time. She is responsive on mails for even the smallest of queries and answers all doubts patiently.  Extremely knowledgeable about her craft - we trusted her blindly and she guided us brilliantly. Would highly recommend her to everyone!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: *** ** *** **** ****** ******* *** ****** ******** I would strongly recommend her for anyone who is looking for a best gynaecologist. She listened to all my queries with patience and handed my pregnancy very well till the end of my delivery. Very promot reply on any queries asked.She was there to take care of my delivery at morning 4 am. I owe a lot to her. Thank you doctor !!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
********** ** * ***** ********would recommend her to everyone***** ** *** **** ****** ** ***********very optimistic very professional *** *** * ***** ************My labour was for around 24 hours and she waited for normal delivery never rushed for c sec even of me asking for it..
She successfully delivered me normally with lpt of patience..

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Shefali is very well experienced, professional doctor.  I was visiting her from my 1st trimester till delivery. At 4 month I was diagnosed with law line placenta and was in bed rest for a month. That time I was very scared but doctor always given me strength to be strong. At end of 5 months I was again totally normal as placenta moved up. I was very satisfied with her treatment and behaviour.  Though she talk less but always patiently answers patients query. At 38 weeks I was delivered a baby girl in normal delivery. All thanks to her. I highly recommend Dr. Shefali....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We consulted Dr. Shefali as soon as we got to know my wife is pregnant. From the first visit until the delivery, we have been so grateful towards the doctor in the way she handled us.She is extremely knowledgeable, approachable, and easy to talk to. You need to prepare your questions well and she will answer them all for you patiently. She is the one stop person for us whenever we had any doubts. Once she has responded, we used to be extremely relaxed. We never looked for a second opinion or looked the Internet.This being our first pregnancy, we used to mail her for the smallest questions and we would get an immediate reply. There was no stress.It is only due to Dr. Shefali and her expertise that we could prepare and get the normal delivery, she motivated my wife so much and handled a difficult case so well. We are so thankful to Dr. Shefali for the beautiful experience throughout.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pregnancy care and management,Caesarean Section (C Section),
review: I delivered in Cloudnine Bellandur mid July 2021 under Dr Shefali Tyagi. My pregnancy was largely uncomplicated barring when I caught Covid during week 33. She is a pretty straightforward doctor. Is always very clear with her communication and patient with our queries. She might not come across as friendly and chatty but her responses have the warmth needed to comfort us. She gives prompt email support (no phone/WA support) and proactively checked on me when I was down with Covid. Post Partum support in the hospital and post discharge is also good and comforting. Overall a very positive experience.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: ** ****** ********* ** ********** **** ** *** *******  We had a lot of trust initially but as the weeks pass by we could not find any sign of positive results. Every month we had to repeat the same procedure and faced failure every time. ****** ***** *** ******** *** ***** ***** ** *** ***** *** ** ****** *********** *** ***** *** ***** ******** We were told to keep trying just like that.   I felt like i asked more questions to the doctor on the treatment process than she asked us about our health status.  * **** * ****** ****** **** ****** ************** ** ********** * ********* ****** ********* *** ********** **** ** ***** ** ********* ******* ****** *** ** ****** **** ** ** ****  We are fully disappointed now and in search of some other doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Shefali did delivery of my second baby. I am thrilled with her guidance, *** **** *** ** ** ********* ************ ** ********** I had issues during my first pregnancy in Delhi. But she took her time to understand my medical history very well. There was no issues during pregnancy and she suggested for normal delivery however my first delivery was c-section. She is honest to her work and was always there whenever I need her either during treatment OR delivery. Best thing is she understood the problem well and prescribed exact medicines.Everything went well during delivery, she supported me well to calm my nerves down as I was so depressed before delivery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review: I visited doctor Shefali , it was my first visit to doctor I was so worried because I was having UTI , so I told her that I had some pain in stomach from long , ***** *** ** *** *** ****** * **** **** **** *** ******* ** **** ***** ** she checked my stomach by her hand and pushed very hard I asked to do slowly in answer she said don't ACT , and without looking at me she prescribed some medicine, it was very bad experience. I will never recommend her. I told this to my family and friends so everyone sad *** *** ** *** **** ***** ** * ** **** ** *** ****** **** *** ********* ***** ******** ******* ******** ******* **** ****** ****** ******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I would say that she is always in hurry, she doesn’t explain anything, instead she will just ask you if have any queries regarding your pregnancy. I consulted her for complete 9 months of my pregnancy and gone through with such situations every when she called for checkup* ** ** **** ***** *** ********* ** ** *** **section coz of 7.5 amniotic flui** ******* *** ****** **** ** **** ** * ******* *** **** * **** *** ********** *** ******esia doctor didn’t give injection correctly on my spinal cord when I was in OT and due to which, lot of backache and one side complete leg started paining”a very acute pain”. Basically it lead to slip disk, when I complain this to her she started shouting at me saying that slip disk can’t occur coz of this delivery and she asked me to consult a orthopaedic if I have any pain after delivery. I won’t recommend her at all.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: She should give more time in understanding the root cause of the patients problem..like i said inhave severe back pain post 9 month..she just talked abt my posture ***** ***** ******** ************* **** ****** ***** *** ****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: She is humble. Took time to hear about the problem. Proper investigation was done. Would definitely recommend

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She has been phenomenal. I visited her after visiting quite a few other doctors. Extremely satisfied with her professionalism *** **********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dear Shefali Ma'am,I was blessed with a baby boy on 26th July'2020 by c section. I would like to say thank you so much to you for all your support and timely guidance from day one.The best moment was your support , understanding and friendly behaviour at the time of  c section delivery. Your guidance and support from day one to till discharge from hospital after delivery was highly appreciated.Now my baby is 3 months 11 days :-) . Thank you so much .Regards,Niharika Samantaray

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Not recommended at all !! By seeing the first scan after i got miscarriage, *** ***** ****** **** ** *** *** ******* **
But she *** *** **** *** ** ******* *** told its healthy and you need not to worry .

Also she is not easily reachable. All my happiness got turned into sadness in 1 day

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: we consulted doctor for our 1st pregnancy, she was very helpful through out the period. she does magic, you need to ask your needs and she would take care of that with utmost care. my wife developed gestational diabetes, Doctor took care of that and managed to do normal delivery,  I highly recommend the doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy Tests,Pregnancy Scan,Bleeding During Pregnancy,
review: Shefali mam suggestion and guidance is very helpful during our pre and post pregnancy. She is always reachable even in emails. She replies immediately for each and every mail even if it is a silly question. Because of mam we had a happy and healthy pregnancy. Post pregnancy recovery is also very fast. She remembers each and every issue of the patient and asks in all consultations.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I had gone for my IUD removal and placement of new one... The doctor did the procedure with proper guidance and with very little discomfort.. I was very happy as the doctor placed IUD so quickly I hardly felt anything. So Dr Shefali will be my go to gynaecologist in Bangalore,

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I am seeing Dr Shefali for the first time. A friend of mine suggested me to consult with her. I visit her for a routine check-up on 29th Dec 2020. She was absolutely professional and thorough in her diagnosis. No unnecessary medications gave unbiased advice, assessed the situation carefully. She also recommended me to see a physiotherapist (Prachi). Lastly, what I liked the most, she uses evidence as a tool, not as a determinant of practice. Overall, I liked her consultation and diagnosis.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: i had a wonderful experience with Dr Shefali. She is a friendly doctor, thorough professional and up to date with her treatment. I consulted her for nine months and had a vaginal delivery under her care. She advised epidural for me and my delivery was very smooth. I will strongly recommend her. All my friends consult her and are equally satisfied

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We consulted doctor for our pregnancy. It was a 9 month journey. ****** ** ************* *** her diagnosis are to the point. Always available on E mail & responds to us within 10-15 mins. Overall experience was good.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Though she is very well known doctor based on rating but as personal experience she wants to be free as soon as possible with minimal communication and work. *** ** ********* *** ****** ******** *** ** ****** *** ** ** **** ** ****** *** ****** *****
